The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, they do not realize that what was going on with them is solely related to an unseen and ancient phenomenon: Love, which had gotten its members as it stood to take control of their bodies. This archaeological journey introduces you into unknown history into how Love started and How to be free from Its sand trap.

Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is going to be criticized by some because it has very little coherence or actual plot, but I think that one and a half should watch it if you’re looking for something mindless with fun action sequences but also a bit of humor.
